card.name: Fireball
card.text: Deal 2 damage. If this spell destroys a Minion or Structure, immediately gain 1 ember.

card.name: Bonfire
card.text: Destroy 3 ingited pyres, then create 1 bonfire. Gives +5 ember per turn.

card.name: Inferno
card.text: Cost 3 ember. Deals damage equal to twice that of the previous Inferno cast this turn. Draw 1 card.

card.name: Lamentation of the Firebird
card.text: Ignite all of your own combustible structures.

card.name: Blaze of Glory
card.text: Sacrifice any number of ignited Structures. Deals 3 damage per sacrificed Pyre and 12 damager per sacrificed Bonfire.

card.name: Scorch
card.text: Cost 2 ember. Ignite any card on the board, dealing 3 damage per turn. +1 ember per turn as long as the target is ignited.

card.name: Burn
card.text: Ignite any card on the board, dealing 1 damage per turn. +1 ember per turn as long as the target is ignited.

card.name: Hellfire Comet
card.text: This card comes into play with 2 turn counters. At the start of your turn remove a counter. When the last counter is removed, draw a card every time a spell is played for the rest of turn.

card.name: Gale Winds
card.text: Extinguish all ignited cards. Your opponents minions cannot attack next turn.

card.name: Scorched Earth
card.text: On your next turn, all ignited Structures produce 2x ember. Destroy half of your ignited Structures starting with Bonfires, rounding down.

card.name: Summon Fire Demon
card.text: Cost 5 ember. Summon one Fire Demon.

card.name: Fire Demon
card.text: Costs 5 ember. Gain 2 ember per turn. Once per Minion phase, if ember is greater than 10, may attack as if commanded.

card.name: Rain of Fire
card.text: Deal 2 damage to all minions in opponent's field.

card.name: Fiery Inspiration
card.text: Draw 2 cards. If you have 10 or more ember draw 3 cards.
